c74object.name: j.initialized
c74object.digest: Send a notification bang when a Jamoma model is initialized
c74object.description: j.initialized sends a deferlowed and optionally delayed bang on Jamoma model initialization

outlet.digest: Send a bang on Jamoma model initialization
outlet.description: Send a deferlowed and optionally delayed bang on model initialization

objarg.name: Jamoma model name
objarg.digest: Jamoma model name to listen to initialization state
objarg.description: Jamoma model name to listen to initialization state

objarg.name: Delay time
objarg.digest: Optional delay time before sending notification bang
objarg.description: Optional delay time before sending notification bang
